ios-installation-guide.title: iOS installation guide
ios-installation-guide.how-to-install-header: How to install TokenD wallet app on iOS
ios-installation-guide.apple-policy-desc: Unfortunately, Apple AppStore has a strict and unreliable policy regarding cryptocurrency-related apps. Because of this, we are unable to provide stable application updates through AppStore.
ios-installation-guide.steps-desc: In order to install TokenD iOS wallet app follow the next steps:
ios-installation-guide.install-step: Close browser and wait until the app is downloaded and installed.
ios-installation-guide.first-launch-step: On the first attempt to launch the app, you will see a message show on the first image below. Close that dialog and perform next steps (illustrated below for iOS 12). Please make sure you’re connected to the internet.
